name: Paykit payment gateway
author: Paykit

sections.description:
Paykit payment gateway helps sellers accept payments using a variety of methods. Sellers only need to set the parameters provided by Paykit, buyers can pay with all types of cards.

Paykit offers payment services and plugins that make it easy for merchants to use them. In the parameters to be set, API url is the address of Paykit’s payment service, the plugin will call this url to perform the payment flow.

You can refer to some information about Paykit at: https://paykit.vn/vn/home
Terms of use: https://paykit.vn/vn/dieu-khoan-va-dieu-kien-dang-ky-and-su-dung-dich-vu-chap-nhan-thanh-toan-paykit

short_description: Plugin of Paykit payment gateway, supports for all websites using WooCommerce with a variety of payment methods and makes checkout process convenient.
